resources.string: Please add here your email address

ScrollView - scrollable view that contains one child view FrameLayout - block out an area on the screen to display a single item WebView - displays web pages RelativeLayout - arranges views relative to other views/parent RecyclerView* - scrollable "list" of views or view groups ConstraintLayout* - position and size widgets in a flexible way ScrollView - scrollable view that contains one child view FrameLayout - block out an area on the screen to display a single item WebView - displays web pages RelativeLayout - arranges views relative to other views/parent RecyclerView* - scrollable "list" of views or view groups ConstraintLayout* - position and size widgets in a flexible way ScrollView - scrollable view that contains one child view FrameLayout - block out an area on the screen to display a single item WebView - displays web pages RelativeLayout - arranges views relative to other views/parent RecyclerView* - scrollable "list" of views or view groups ConstraintLayout* - position and size widgets in a flexible way ScrollView - scrollable view that contains one child view FrameLayout - block out an area on the screen to display a single item WebView - displays web pages RelativeLayout - arranges views relative to other views/parent RecyclerView* - scrollable "list" of views or view groups ConstraintLayout* - position and size widgets in a flexible way
